title: BADecker
author: BADecker
content: When you take a close look at the Joe-Biden-Historic-Year, you realize two major things:1. This is probably the closest the US has ever come to being destroyed;2. Only the thinking Christians know why the US hasn't been destroyed.Time for us all to follow the two ways of righteous, in their proper order:- First, recognize Jesus salvation which is holding everything together, even with the Biden crew around;- Second, follow the ways of righteousness, starting with what is written in the Ten Commandments.Joe Biden Cheers Historic Year: Record Crime, Record Inflation, Record Illegal Immigration, Record Gas Prices, Worst Stock/Bond/Equity Losses Since 1871https://www.thegatewaypundit.com/2022/12/joe-biden-cheers-historic-year-record-crime-record-inflation-record-illegal-immigration-record-gas-prices-worst-stock-bond-equity-losses-since-1871/Joe Biden cheered his historic year on Twitter today.Well, his staffers did. Joe was in St. Croix pretending to golf.The tweet included photos of Joe delivering a State of the Union Address, Joe with the crazy lady he nominated to the Supreme Court, Joe inside a car only a fool would let him drive, Joe walking outside without stumbling.Joe forgot to mention a few historic moments from 2022.The House GOP Judiciary Committee helped him out.2022 was truly a historic year for America.The highest gas prices in US history.Record crime on our streets. There were over one million stolen cars in 2022 alone.Inflation was out of control at a 40-year high in 2022.Illegal immigration broke all records. Over 5 million illegal aliens have crossed over the open southern border into the United States in Joe Biden's first two years in office.And the US stock market had its worst year since 2008.And as Steve Bannon reported, "If you add Bond losses to Stock/Equity losses total over $10 Trillion… the worse losses since 1871… repeat 1871."...

comments.author: TwitchySeal
comments.body: lol.  We don't have the data from 2022 yet for crime, but it's nowhere near as bad as it was 30 years ago.  Not sure about BADeckerville, just the real world.  QuoteInflation was out of control at a 40-year high in 2022.Ok but it was down about 50% from the 41-year high.QuoteRecord crime on our streets. QuoteThere were over one million stolen cars in 2022 alone.

comments.author: Theones
comments.body: Quote from: BADecker on January 01, 2023, 12:07:56 PMWhen you take a close look at the Joe-Biden-Historic-Year, you realize two major things:1. This is probably the closest the US has ever come to being destroyed;2. Only the thinking Christians know why the US hasn't been destroyed.Time for us all to follow the two ways of righteous, in their proper order:- First, recognize Jesus salvation which is holding everything together, even with the Biden crew around;- Second, follow the ways of righteousness, starting with what is written in the Ten Commandments.Joe Biden Cheers Historic Year: Record Crime, Record Inflation, Record Illegal Immigration, Record Gas Prices, Worst Stock/Bond/Equity Losses Since 1871https://www.thegatewaypundit.com/2022/12/joe-biden-cheers-historic-year-record-crime-record-inflation-record-illegal-immigration-record-gas-prices-worst-stock-bond-equity-losses-since-1871/Joe Biden cheered his historic year on Twitter today.Well, his staffers did. Joe was in St. Croix pretending to golf.The tweet included photos of Joe delivering a State of the Union Address, Joe with the crazy lady he nominated to the Supreme Court, Joe inside a car only a fool would let him drive, Joe walking outside without stumbling.Joe forgot to mention a few historic moments from 2022.The House GOP Judiciary Committee helped him out.2022 was truly a historic year for America.The highest gas prices in US history.Record crime on our streets. There were over one million stolen cars in 2022 alone.Inflation was out of control at a 40-year high in 2022.Illegal immigration broke all records. Over 5 million illegal aliens have crossed over the open southern border into the United States in Joe Biden's first two years in office.And the US stock market had its worst year since 2008.And as Steve Bannon reported, "If you add Bond losses to Stock/Equity losses total over $10 Trillion… the worse losses since 1871… repeat 1871."...the worse of all the mistake was the exit from Afghanistan - this year the gov has helped them all when the year ends - and they will be returning their taxes it will be another disaster
